text.section: Consistent with the purposes of this title, the Joint Ethics Committee may establish criteria for making a finding in its written procedures established under § 15-519(a) of this subtitle.

If the Joint Ethics Committee makes a finding under this section, the Joint Ethics Committee shall:
terminate the proceeding against a legislator; or
issue any recommendations to the presiding officer of the house of the legislator or to the full house of the legislator, including any recommendations for appropriate sanctions.
